title: Prompt #1 Pillar Pages
content: Create a comprehensive, detailed pillar page designed to be easily read and understood by a 6th-grade student. Use simple, clear, and engaging language throughout. Begin with an introduction to the main topic, explaining its importance and relevance to young learners. Break down complex ideas into smaller, digestible sections with subheadings. Include fun facts, examples, and illustrations to maintain interest. Conclude with a summary that reinforces key points and encourages further exploration or discussion.

title: Test first plan
content:
Go back and forth with me until we have a good plan based on modern practices.

Make sure each part of the outline adds up total to 3000 words as we are creating a category page for the topic.
